reviewText: The entire family loves watching Mythbusters. We have been watching it for at least the past 6 to 7 years. So when I can add to my son's collection of DVD's, I do so. This is our newest addition. It's funny and we love all the background information and behind the scenes additions. This DVD was used, but in wonderful condition. It shipped quickly and I was able to give it to my son for Christmas.
I absolutely love this DVD and have watched it several times!  There are some totally hysterical moments for sure, and perhaps some insight into the Mythbusters as well.  Very entertaining!
